## Plot of housingprices and age

```{r}

plot(stockton5$age, stockton5$sprice, xlab = "Age", ylab = "Price")
```

- Above we see a plot of how the the price of houses corresponds with age. 





## Intraday movement 14.09.2018 of stock Questerre Energy Corporation(QEC)


```{r fig.height = 6, fig.widt = 8, fig.align = "center"}
plot(QEC_14.09$`Questerre Energy Corporation`, QEC_14.09$Pris, type = "l", xlab = "Time", ylab = "Price")
```



- Above is the plot of intraday movement of the QEC. During the day the stock returned **5,52%**.
